title: Slow Cooker Chili Mac
description: Delicious slow cooker chili mac recipe

ingredients.name: Extra Lean Ground Beef or Lean Ground Turkey (93%-97% lean)
4 lg Garlic Cloves, pressed or finely minced
Kosher Salt (or ¼ tsp table salt)
Beef Bouillon (such as Better Than Bouillon®)
Beans (red kidney, black, or pinto) drained & rinsed
Elbow Macaroni (or 8 oz other pasta) dry

instructions: Add the meat, onion, garlic, bay leaf, chili powder, cumin, smoked paprika, oregano, salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper. Stir. If your ground beef isn't lean, just brown it and drain fat before adding.
Add the diced green chiles, diced tomatoes, beef broth, bouillon, beans, and tomato paste. Stir well.
Cook on Low for 6-8 hours, or High for 3-4 hours.
If you add the pasta dry, add it 20 minutes before serving and cook on Low. If adding cooked pasta, add just before serving.
Taste and adjust salt, if needed. Garnish with your choice of sour cream, cheese, avocado, diced onion, corn chips, cilantro, etc.
